import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Segment, Container, Image, Icon } from "semantic-ui-react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { withTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import i18n from "i18next"; import DesktopBreakpoint from "../../components/Responsive_utillities/desktop_breakPoint"; import PhoneBreakpoint from "../../components/Responsive_utillities/phone_breakPoint"; import FooterSocialMedia from "./Footer-socialMedia"; import { imageUrl, playStoreHref, AppleHref } from "./config"; import "./LandingPageFooter.css"; import { routeConstants } from "../../constants"; import FooterDownloadLinks from "./FooterDownloadLinks"; class Footer extends Component { componentDidMount() { document.body.dir = i18n.dir(); window.scrollTo(0, 0); } render() { const language = localStorage.getItem("i18nextLng"); const { t } = this.props; return (
{language === "ar" ? (
) : (
)}

{t("landingPage:privacyPolicy")}

{t("landingPage:termsandConditions")}

{t("landingPage:createdBy")} {t("landingPage:techTag")}

{t("landingPage:copyrights")}

{t("landingPage:privacyPolicy")}

{t("landingPage:termsandConditions")}

{t("landingPage:createdBy")}{" "} {t("landingPage:techTag")}

{t("landingPage:copyrights")}

); } } export default withTranslation("landingPage")(Footer);
